actions.text: Introduced in the Senate and held at the desk by unanimous consent. Until the close of business February 19, 1985.
Held at the desk by unanimous consent. Until the close of business February 25, 1985.
Referred to the Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to Subcommittee on Agricultural Production.
Committee on Agriculture requested executive comment from Agriculture Department.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Agricultural Production, Marketing, and Stabilization of Prices

official_title: A bill to amend the Agricultural Act of 1949 to require the Secretary of Agriculture to make available to producers advance loans on the 1985 crop of certain commodities.

summary.text: Emergency Farm Credit Act of 1985 - Amends the Agricultural Act of 1949 to make specified advance loans available for the 1985 crops of wheat, feed grains, soybeans, rice, and upland cotton. Limits amounts to any one producer to $50,000.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Agricultural Act of 1949 to require the Secretary of Agriculture to make available to producers advance loans on the 1985 crop of certain commodities.
